---
title: "In-class Exercise 2"
author: "Leow Xian Zu"
date: "2 Sep 2024"
date-modified: "last-modified"
execute:
  eval: true
  echo: true 
  message: false #no more warning message
  freeze: true #whatever document already commited does not render
---


# Set up

## Finding maptools

Maptools have been retired. So we installed it from the CRAN repository.


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
install.packages("maptools", repos = "https://packagemanager.posit.co/cran/2023-10-13")
```
:::


## Load packages


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, sf, tmap, ggstatsplot, spatstat)
set.seed(1234)
```
:::


## Read the map data


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mpsz14_shp <- st_read(dsn = "C:/zzzzzuu/ISSS626GAA/In-class_Ex/In-class_Ex01/Data",
                layer = "MP14_SUBZONE_WEB_PL")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
Reading layer `MP14_SUBZONE_WEB_PL' from data source 
  `C:\zzzzzuu\ISSS626GAA\In-class_Ex\In-class_Ex01\data' using driver `ESRI Shapefile'
Simple feature collection with 323 features and 15 fields
Geometry type: MULTIPOLYGON
Dimension:     XY
Bounding box:  xmin: 2667.538 ymin: 15748.72 xmax: 56396.44 ymax: 50256.33
Projected CRS: SVY21
```
:::
:::


# Wrangling

## Union for the outline


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
sg_sf <- mpsz14_shp %>%
  st_union()
tmap_mode("plot")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
tmap mode set to plotting
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
qtm(sg_sf)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex02_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


Let's try the spatstet.geom method.


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
childcare_sf <- st_read("C:/zzzzzuu/ISSS626GAA/Hands-on_Ex/Hands-on_Ex02/data/child-care-services-geojson.geojson") %>%
  st_transform(crs = 3414)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
Reading layer `child-care-services-geojson' from data source 
  `C:\zzzzzuu\ISSS626GAA\Hands-on_Ex\Hands-on_Ex02\data\child-care-services-geojson.geojson' 
  using driver `GeoJSON'
Simple feature collection with 1545 features and 2 fields
Geometry type: POINT
Dimension:     XYZ
Bounding box:  xmin: 103.6824 ymin: 1.248403 xmax: 103.9897 ymax: 1.462134
z_range:       zmin: 0 zmax: 0
Geodetic CRS:  WGS 84
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
childcare <- as_Spatial(childcare_sf)
childcareSG_ppp <- as.ppp(childcare_sf)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Warning in as.ppp.sf(childcare_sf): only first attribute column is used for
marks
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
sg_owin <- as.owin(sg_sf)
plot(sg_owin)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex02_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
childcareSG_ppp <- childcareSG_ppp[sg_owin]

childcareSG_ppp.km <- rescale.ppp(childcareSG_ppp, 1000, "km")
kde_childcareSG.bw <- density(childcareSG_ppp.km, sigma=bw.diggle, edge=TRUE, kernel="gaussian")

kde_childcareSG_adaptive <- adaptive.density(childcareSG_ppp.km, method="kernel")
plot(kde_childcareSG_adaptive)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex02_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-2.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
gridded_kde_childcareSG_ad <- as(
  kde_childcareSG_adaptive,
  "SpatialGridDataFrame")
pacman::p_load(sp)
spplot(gridded_kde_childcareSG_ad)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex02_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-3.png){width=672}
:::
:::


# Following Prof's upload on in-class exercise


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
childcare_ppp <- as.ppp(childcare_sf)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Warning in as.ppp.sf(childcare_sf): only first attribute column is used for
marks
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
plot(childcare_ppp)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Warning in default.charmap(ntypes, chars): Too many types to display every type
as a different character
```

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
childcareSG_ppp = childcare_ppp[sg_owin]
childcareSG_ppp.km <- rescale.ppp(childcareSG_ppp, 
                                  1000, 
                                  "km")

kde_childcareSG_adaptive <- adaptive.density(
  childcareSG_ppp.km, 
  method="kernel")
plot(kde_childcareSG_adaptive)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex02_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-8-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
gridded_kde_childcareSG_ad <- as(
  kde_childcareSG_adaptive,
  "SpatialGridDataFrame")
spplot(gridded_kde_childcareSG_ad)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex02_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-9-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tm_shape(gridded_kde_childcareSG_ad) + 
  tm_raster(palette = "viridis") +
  tm_layout(legend.position = c("right", "bottom"), 
            frame = FALSE,
            bg.color = "#E4D5C9")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Warning: Currect projection of shape gridded_kde_childcareSG_ad unknown. Long
lat (epsg 4326) coordinates assumed.
```
:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex02_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-10-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


## Dive into Punggol


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pg_owin <- mpsz14_shp %>%
  filter(PLN_AREA_N == "PUNGGOL") %>%
  as.owin()

childcare_pg = childcare_ppp[pg_owin]

plot(childcare_pg)  
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Warning in default.charmap(ntypes, chars): Too many types to display every type
as a different character
```
:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Warning: Only 10 out of 61 symbols are shown in the symbol map
```
:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex02_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-11-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
set.seed(1234)
```
:::


# A look into Thai Road Accidents


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
rdacc_sf <- read_csv("C:/zzzzzuu/ISSS626GAA/Take-home_Ex/Take-home_Ex01/Data/thai_road_accident_2019_2022.csv") %>%
  filter(!is.na(longitude) & longitude != "", 
         !is.na(latitude) & latitude != "") %>%
  st_as_sf(coords = c(
    "longitude", "latitude"),
    crs=4326) %>%
  st_transform(crs = 32647) 
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Rows: 81735 Columns: 18
── Column specification ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
Delimiter: ","
chr  (10): province_th, province_en, agency, route, vehicle_type, presumed_c...
dbl   (6): acc_code, number_of_vehicles_involved, number_of_fatalities, numb...
dttm  (2): incident_datetime, report_datetime

ℹ Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data.
ℹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message.
```
:::
:::
